title: Bioluminescence sensors make new approaches to drug discovery possible

title_detail.value: Bioluminescence sensors make new approaches to drug discovery possible

summary: Researchers describe the use of 13 molecular tools for measuring different intracellular signaling pathways and evaluating the action mechanisms of new drugs.

summary_detail.value: Researchers describe the use of 13 molecular tools for measuring different intracellular signaling pathways and evaluating the action mechanisms of new drugs.
